verses.verse: Oh <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> upon His <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H3045>Make<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> His <S%H5949>deeds<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>
<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to Him, <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to Him; <S%H7878>Speak<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H6381>wonders.<s%>
<S%H1984>Glory<s%> in His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name;<s%> Let the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be <S%H8055>glad.<s%>
<S%H1875>Seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and His <S%H5797>strength;<s%> <S%H1245>Seek<s%> His <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> His <S%H4159>wonders<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He has <S%H6213>done,<s%> His <S%H4159>marvels,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> uttered by His <S%H6310>mouth,<s%>
O <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> His <S%H5650>servant,<s%> O <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> His <S%H972>chosen<s%> <S%H972>ones!<s%>
He is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God;<s%> His <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He has <S%H2142>remembered<s%> His <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> The <S%H1697>word<s%> which He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1755>generations,<s%>
[The covenant] <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H3772>made<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> And His <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>
Then He <S%H5975>confirmed<s%> it to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for a <S%H2706>statute,<s%> To <S%H3478>Israel<s%> as an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%>
<S%H559>Saying,<s%> "To you I will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> As the <S%H9112>portion<s%> of your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%>"
When they were only a <S%H4962>few<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%> in <S%H4557>number,<s%> Very <S%H4592>few,<s%> and <S%H1481>strangers<s%> in it.
And they <S%H1980>wandered<s%> about from <S%H1471>nation<s%> to <S%H1471>nation,<s%> From [one] <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>
He <S%H5117>permitted<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H6231>oppress<s%> them, And He <S%H3198>reproved<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> for their sakes: <S%H5921><s%>
"Do not <S%H5060>touch<s%> My <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H4899>ones,<s%> And <S%H7489>do<s%> My <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H7489>harm.<s%>"
And He <S%H7121>called<s%> for a <S%H7458>famine<s%> upon the <S%H776>land;<s%> He <S%H7665>broke<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> [who] was <S%H4376>sold<s%> as a <S%H5650>slave.<s%>
They <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> with <S%H3525>fetters,<s%> He <S%H5315>himself<s%> was <S%H935>laid<s%> in <S%H1270>irons;<s%>
<S%H5704>Until<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> that his <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H935>pass,<s%> The <S%H565>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6884>tested<s%> him.
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H5425>released<s%> him, The <S%H4910>ruler<s%> of <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and <S%H6605>set<s%> him <S%H6605>free.<s%>
He <S%H7760>made<s%> him <S%H113>lord<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> And <S%H4910>ruler<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H7075>possessions,<s%>
To <S%H631>imprison<s%> his <S%H8269>princes<s%> at <S%H5315>will,<s%> That he might <S%H2449>teach<s%> his <S%H2205>elders<s%> <S%H2449>wisdom.<s%>
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> also <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> Thus <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham.<s%>
And He caused His <S%H5971>people<s%> to be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> And <S%H6105>made<s%> them <S%H6105>stronger<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> their <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%>
He <S%H2015>turned<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H8130>hate<s%> His <S%H5971>people,<s%> To <S%H5230>deal<s%> <S%H5230>craftily<s%> with His <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> His <S%H5650>servant,<s%> [And] <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> He had <S%H977>chosen.<s%>
They <S%H7760>performed<s%> His <S%H226>wondrous<s%> <S%H1697>acts<s%> among them, And <S%H4159>miracles<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and <S%H2821>made<s%> [it] <S%H2821>dark;<s%> And they did not <S%H4784>rebel<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> His <S%H1697>words.<s%>
He <S%H2015>turned<s%> their <S%H4325>waters<s%> into <S%H1818>blood,<s%> And caused their <S%H1710>fish<s%> to <S%H4191>die.<s%>
Their <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8317>swarmed<s%> with <S%H6854>frogs<s%> [Even] in the <S%H2315>chambers<s%> of their <S%H4428>kings.<s%>
He <S%H559>spoke,<s%> and there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H6157>swarm<s%> of <S%H6157>flies<s%> [And] <S%H3654>gnats<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1366>territory.<s%>
He <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H1259>hail<s%> for <S%H1653>rain,<s%> [And] <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in their <S%H776>land.<s%>

He <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> their <S%H1612>vines<s%> also and their <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H8384>trees,<s%> And <S%H7665>shattered<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of their <S%H1366>territory.<s%>
He <S%H559>spoke,<s%> and <S%H697>locusts<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> And <S%H3218>young<s%> <S%H3218>locusts,<s%> even <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4557>number,<s%>
And <S%H398>ate<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6212>vegetation<s%> in their <S%H776>land,<s%> And <S%H398>ate<s%> up the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their <S%H127>ground.<s%>
He also <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7225>first-born<s%> in their <S%H776>land,<s%> The first <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H202>vigor.<s%>
Then He <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out with <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold;<s%> And among His <S%H7626>tribes<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> was not <S%H369>one<s%> who <S%H3782>stumbled.<s%>
<S%H4714>Egypt<s%> was <S%H8055>glad<s%> when they <S%H3318>departed;<s%> For the <S%H6343>dread<s%> of them had <S%H5307>fallen<s%> upon them.
He <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> for a <S%H4539>covering,<s%> And <S%H784>fire<s%> to <S%H215>illumine<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>
They <S%H7592>asked,<s%> and He <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H7958>quail,<s%> And <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
He <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H2100>flowed<s%> out; It <S%H1980>ran<s%> in the <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H6723>places<s%> [like] a <S%H5104>river.<s%>
For He <S%H2142>remembered<s%> His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> [With] <S%H85>Abraham<s%> His <S%H5650>servant;<s%>
And He <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> His <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H8342>joy,<s%> His <S%H972>chosen<s%> <S%H972>ones<s%> with a <S%H7440>joyful<s%> <S%H7440>shout.<s%>
He <S%H5414>gave<s%> them also the <S%H776>lands<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> That they might <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of [the fruit of] the peoples' <S%H5999>labor,<s%>
<S%H5668>So<s%> that they might <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> And <S%H5341>observe<s%> His <S%H8451>laws,<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord!<s%>
